widget.convert: {"template": [ MultiContentEntryText(pos = (90, 0), size = (600, 30), font=0, text = 0), MultiContentEntryText(pos = (110, 30), size = (600, 50), font=1, flags = RT_VALIGN_TOP, text = 1), MultiContentEntryPixmapAlphaBlend(pos = (0, 0), size = (80, 80), png = 2), ], "fonts": [gFont("Regular", 24),gFont("Regular", 20)], "itemHeight": 85 }

{"template": [ MultiContentEntryText(pos = (6, 2), size = (540, 28), font=0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 0), # index 0 is the name MultiContentEntryText(pos = (6, 28), size = (540, 20), font=1, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 2), # index 2 is the description MultiContentEntryPixmapAlphaTest(pos = (605, 2), size = (48, 48), png = 4), # index 4 is the status pixmap MultiContentEntryPixmapAlphaTest(pos = (5, 50), size = (610, 2), png = 5), # index 4 is the div pixmap ], "fonts": [gFont("Regular", 22),gFont("Regular", 14)], "itemHeight": 52 }

{"template": [ MultiContentEntryPixmapAlphaTest(pos = (18, 5), size = (48, 48), png = 4), # index 4 is the status pixmap MultiContentEntryText(pos = (90, 5), size = (650, 28), font=0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 0), # index 0 is the name MultiContentEntryText(pos = (100, 35), size = (650, 20), font=1, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 2, color=0x8A8787, color_sel=0x8A8787), # index 2 is the description MultiContentEntryPixmapAlphaTest(pos = (5, 58), size = (0, 0), png = 5), # index 4 is the div pixmap ], "fonts": [gFont("Regular", 22),gFont("Regular", 16)], "itemHeight": 60 }

{"template": [ MultiContentEntryText(pos = (90, 0), size = (600, 30), font=0, text = 0), MultiContentEntryText(pos = (110, 30), size = (600, 50), font=1, flags = RT_VALIGN_TOP, text = 1), MultiContentEntryPixmapAlphaBlend(pos = (0, 0), size = (80, 80), png = 2), ], "fonts": [gFont("Regular", 24),gFont("Regular", 20)], "itemHeight": 85 }

{"template": [ MultiContentEntryPixmapAlphaTest(pos = (10, 6), size = (48, 48), png = 1), # index 1 is the expandable/expanded/verticalline icon MultiContentEntryText(pos = (70, 4), size = (600, 26), font=2, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 2), # index 2 is the Hostname MultiContentEntryText(pos = (160, 5), size = (510, 25), font=0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 3), # index 3 is the sharename MultiContentEntryText(pos = (160, 32), size = (510, 17), font=1, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 4), # index 4 is the sharedescription MultiContentEntryPixmapAlphaTest(pos = (65, 6), size = (48, 48), png = 5), # index 5 is the nfs/cifs icon MultiContentEntryPixmapAlphaTest(pos = (110, 6), size = (48, 48), png = 6), # index 6 is the isMounted icon ], "fonts": [gFont("Regular", 22),gFont("Regular2", 17),gFont("Regular2", 24)], "itemHeight": 60 }

{"template": [ MultiContentEntryText(pos = (60, 10), size = (10, 20), font = 2, flags = RT_HALIGN_CENTER | RT_VALIGN_CENTER, text = 1), MultiContentEntryText(pos = (80, 0), size = (260, 21), font = 1, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT | RT_VALIGN_TOP, text = 2), MultiContentEntryText(pos = (350, 0), size = (270, 24), font = 2, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT | RT_VALIGN_CENTER, text = 3), MultiContentEntryText(pos = (80, 24), size = (180, 20), font = 3, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 5), MultiContentEntryText(pos = (270, 24), size = (510, 20), font = 3, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 4), MultiContentEntryPixmapAlphaBlend(pos=(2, 8), size=(50, 30), png=6, flags = BT_SCALE) ], "fonts": [gFont("Regular", 22), gFont("Regular", 20), gFont("Regular", 17), gFont("Regular", 16)], "itemHeight": 45 }
